grapheS.msg1: The graph is currently of type:
grapheS.msg2: Select and move objects using the mouse or workspace
grapheS.msg3: Click on the workspace to add a new vertex.
grapheS.msg4: Select the first vertex of the edge
grapheS.msg5: Click on an object to remove it
grapheS.msg6: Click the restore button to restore the element
grapheS.msg8: Please enter a number that is not equal to zero
grapheS.msg9: The process of adding a weighted edge has been rejected!
grapheS.msg13: Adding an edge: First node selected with ID: {{nodeId}}. Now select the second node.
grapheS.msg14: Adding an edge: Edge source = {{selectedNode1}}, edge target = {{selectedNode2}}. Now enter the weight.
grapheS.msg16: Dijkstra's algorithm: First node selected with ID: {{nodeId}}. Now select the second node.
grapheS.msg22: The process of changing a node id has been rejected!
grapheS.msg23: It is not possible to name two node with the same name
grapheS.msg24: Click on an node to change id of it
grapheS.msg25: Node ID has been successfully changed from {{last}} to {{new}}

algoS.msg7: Select a node to apply the {{algorithm}} algorithm
algoS.msg8: Kruskal's algorithm is only applicable to a weighted connected undirected graph
